member.name: M:BSS.HashTools.xHash.GetFileHash(System.String,BSS.HashTools.xHash.Algorithm)
member.summary: Returns the Hash-Value of a given file in lower-case
member.param:
Valid arguments:
MD5
RIPEMD160
SHA1
SHA256
SHA384
SHA512

member.name: M:BSS.HashTools.xHash.CompareHash(System.String,System.String,BSS.HashTools.xHash.Algorithm)
member.summary: Checks if a given file has a specific hash.
member.param:
Valid arguments:
MD5
RIPEMD160
SHA1
SHA256
SHA384
SHA512
